message: Let's start fair.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can adjust later if you think it's not fair.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about we switch it around this time? 60/40 for me.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise and go down to 55/45.  We can't keep going back and forth, or we'll both end up with less money due to inflation.
Alice, inflation is hurting us both. Let's stop wasting time and split this evenly. 50/50 is the fairest option.
